Text: Gifts With A Personal Touchhtml TEXT VERSION Welcome to Norm Thompson ENews November Order unique personalized gifts nowin time for HOLIDAY delivery Looking for something unusual that shows you put extra thought into their gift Choose a keepsake that is especially for them Here are six unique gifts with that personal touch emailcampaignhomejspsourcecodeNTElink Monogram a robe for him or her The luxury of a fourstar hotels thick terry robe to wear everyday at home Order these robes with your gift recipients personal monogram instead of the hotels insignia In pink or white for women navy or white for men emailcampaignhomejspsourcecodeNTElink Featured Items What was happening on that very day What was happening on the day he graduated On the day she was born Give them a real newspaper that was published on that very day with a Certificate of Authenticity To see details go here emailcampaignhomejspsourcecodeNTElink Double Dominoes in a personalized box They will keep these dominoes on display A more challenging game than traditional double In a handsome wooden box with a glass toppersonalized with their initials To see details go here emailcampaignhomejspsourcecodeNTElink Executive Fun with a monogram For the hardworking executive who could use a break With his own monogram so it will always return to his desk after a playful day Under To see details go here emailcampaignhomejspsourcecodeNTElink Honor a Special Year with coins Your father brother sister or friend was born in Give a coin set beautifully boxed from that special year or any year since except Under To see details go here emailcampaignhomejspsourcecodeNTElink Family Crest customengraved Truly a thoughtful and impressive gift We will research their family name find their crest and customengrave beer mugs with K gold bands or leadcrystal wine gobletsin sets of four To see details go here emailcampaignhomejspsourcecodeNTElink The History of a Family Name A memorable gift for anyone Every family name has an interesting history and this gift honors their heritage We research their name capture the details on a certificate and frame it To see details go here
